documents.document: #USER# Yes I do get help from Pychitrist and some chemicals. I open up about it to try and help. The last couple of weeks has been great however the darkness does return and its awful. DM me if you need to shout and scream at someone. I am here a lot 🤗🤗😘

#USER# Two , little toe and my nose which I was unaware of until I went to the doctors as I had uncomfortable feeling in the left nostril. It had healed and the doctor suggested I had done it years ago. Weird!

OK I just went to my local garage to get a Birra Moretti a favourite of mine and its brewed in Italy #USER# . Those who like lager try it it's great. Anyway on my way back I sat on a wall as I can't do the 100 or so metres in one go.

Sitting there when a young woman walked past with who I assume her BF. She made this old blokes day. She said "hello Good Evening to you" I returned the compliment and she wished me a happy evening. She doesn't know but I haven't spoken to anybody in days. We'll other than here.
Roll on Christmas Take care Rebecca from us over here. #URL#
